title: Vitavelle Face Moisturizer for Sensitive Skin – Sensitive Skin Moisturizer for Face w/ Allantoin & Lactic Acid – Vegan Daily Moisturizer Face Cream for Sensitive Skin – Facial Skin Care Product (50ml)
features: SENSITIVE SKIN requires a SOOTHING facial moisturizer that GENTLY HYDRATES skin – but many so-called face moisturizers for sensitive skin actually end up IRRITATING skin, causing REDNESS or even an allergic reaction. Vitavelle’s Day Care for Sensitive Skin is FORMULATED ESPECIALLY for DELICATE COMPLEXIONS, made with ZERO PARABENS or harsh chemicals that risk aggravating the skin. So you can trust this sensitive face moisturizer for your skin’s DAILY DOSE of CALMING MOISTURE – with no irritation.

THE LAST THING YOU WANT for your sensitive skin is a HEAVY face cream moisturizer that’s OVERWHELMING FOR YOUR SKIN TYPE. Our lightweight daily face moisturizer soaks quickly into the skin, giving your face the hydration it needs to STAY MOISTURIZED and PROTECTED ALL DAY LONG. Simply massage this sensitive skin face moisturizer gently into the skin in the morning after cleansing for fresh DAILY HYDRATION.

A CALMING, HYDRATING DRINK of DAILY MOISTURE for sensitive complexions – This daily moisturizer for face is formulated with ingredients hand-selected for their gentle yet effective MOISTURIZING POWER. That includes SOOTHING Allantoin, hydrating, REDNESS-REDUCING Panthenol, and BRIGHTENING Lactic Acid, which may help to BOOST CERAMIDE production as it moisturizes. Our panthenol cream face moisturizer is the ideal blend for calm, even-toned, WELL-HYDRATED SKIN, every day.

ZERO CRUELTY – and 100% TRANSPARENCY. Made in Germany in a no-cruelty facility, our daily moisturizer for sensitive skin contains NO PARABENS, HARSH CHEMICALS, or IRRITATING MINERAL OILS. Delivered in a darkened glass pump bottle for UV PROTECTION, this skin cream for sensitive skin for face is packaged for LONG-LASTING USE – and reuse!

AT VITAVELLE, WE’RE PASSIONATE about developing facial creams & moisturizers that combine the PUREST INGREDIENTS with the most ADVANCED SCIENTIFIC METHODS. We believe the best, most deeply beneficial ingredients are those that come straight from nature. OUR CUSTOMERS are our HIGHEST PRIORITY – if for any reason you don’t love your hydrating face moisturizer, we’re standing by to help in any way we can.
